name: Levi Mezei
title: I had a problem with my subscription…
content: I had a problem with my subscription cancellation and I asked for help. They replied in 3 hours with much of flexibility and they solved my problem. I recommend them because they are trustworthy and flexible.

name: Jesús Ramirez
title: I regret my purchase
content: I regret my purchase. Not really interesting since the sales tracker is down...

name: Alparslan
title: Fast and reliable support.
content: I don`t know why people are complaining about customer support and refunds. I have also registered with 7 days free trial, then I forgot to cancel my subscription and my card have been charged. For this reason I reached out to them and kindly asked to refund my money. It`s true that their reply takes up to 24 hours but we have to focus on the result. They have refunded despite the fact that they were right.  because it was totally my fault.

name: NahItsWes
title: Good Products and sales tracking to see…
content: Good Products and sales tracking to see your competition also can help find a good winning product.

name: Alex E
title: Very useful app
content: Great app. Easy to use and load of data. They should add a feature where can find product competitors and check immediately each of them's revenue, that would be insane to see if a product is working for others😎

name: JOZEFIX
title: Totally a money pit.
content: Yes, there was a problem, but it was resolved immediately. Thank you very much.

name: DANI
title: this is a scam
content: this is a scam, please don't use this app it's a fraud, all stats are wrong, look even to other reviews and you will understand this big scam. they don't have acces to shopify sales at all, just showing random numbers, I tried for my 2 own stores and I see crazy numbers so far from the reality.

name: james martin
title: so far in my opinion for dropshipping…Is the best around
content: In my opinion Dropship.io is an excellent piece of kit for info on products that iv not found in any other sites even once you've set up your free visit the walk through in each section is laid out for beginners like myself, if your unsure how the section works you can click on a short video and that explains everything pretty clear, to be honest i thought it was going to be just like all the other sites surrounding e=commerce i was surprised as its in my opinion superb keep up the good work and im glad i came across this site cheers James

name: dundar ece
title: Dropship is a really reliable place
content: Dropship is a really reliable place. I am very lucky to have met and collaborated with him. You can also use it safely. thanks dropship..

name: Mohanad Said
title: Despite what you read in other reviews
content: Despite what you read in other reviews

name: Josué Tavares
title: I am very disappointed with the…
content: I am very disappointed with the services provided. I subscribed to the subscription with a 30% discount offered by dropship.io. Following that, due to a misunderstanding, my subscription was canceled, which is not at all what I intended. Despite several emails and unsatisfactory responses, they don't seem to understand, and it's impossible to reach someone who cares. They don't seem capable to offer the same discount that I had before. It's really unfortunate because I'm interested in their services, but they don't seem to care about an interested customer. Very disappointing.

name: mehdi bejja
title: SCAMMERS
content: I took the free trial then cancelled my subscription 4 days before the end of the trial. They STILL charged me for $79!!!! The product is garbage they lie about a lot of stats. The owner is supposedly an 8 figure entrepreneur but he needs to scam people for $79. They obviously need to scam people when the product is that bad.

name: Thomas
title: Inaccurate data and no refunds
content: The data offered by Dropship.io is extremely inaccurate and hence makes its complete software totally useless. I asked for a refund but they refused it. I'd really not recommend this company to anyone who takes his or her business seriously. Stay away.

name: Akshaj Pratham
title: they are unprofessional didn't even let…
content: they are unprofessional didn't even let make an account extremely disappointed amongst them

name: Anas Madi
title: SCAM DO NOT BUY!!
content: SCAM DO NOT BUY!!

name: Timothy Reeves
title: Scammers
content: Scammers, bad company.I canceled but they still took my money, worse yet they will not allow me to take my card off. They can can continue to charge me. Total scammers.I have to change my card now for a new one. FTC needs to get involved.

name: Simmy Marc
title: FULL SCAM just criminals charging for…
content: FULL SCAM just criminals charging for nothing, I unsubscribed, they still take money from me. I messaged support, no one replied. Had to go to my bank and let the credit card company take the money back by force. It took almost 6 months!!!! Do not put your payment data in their form!!!!!!!

name: Wayed
title: They are Scammer this Site is Not…
content: They are Scammer this Site is Not Professional Take Care dont Type Your Credit Card in there they will Charge You before Trial and dont refund You

name: Tim Lee
title: Impossible to live without
content: Impossible to live without. The best dropshipping tool on the market by far.

name: Branka Elek
title: Scam! Stay away from it!
content: First, you get a trial version that barely works, then they charge you money, and afterwards nothing works anymore. No customer support! Stay away from it!

name: Can Akay
title: do not give your card details they are…
content: do not give your card details they are scammers!! even if you cancel the plan they still take the money.

name: Gadget Tech
title: I cancelled my plan following the trial…
content: I cancelled my plan following the trial version and they still went ahead and charged my account. I would completely stay away from this organization.

name: Cait
title: SCAM
content: this software has been nothing but a SCAM for me. Not only did they make it impossible for me to cancel my subscription plan, but they also continued to charge me even though I had requested cancellation.

name: Pele Hagger
title: Brilliant website
content: Brilliant website, great tool to begin your dropshippinig Career!

name: William Burbank
title: I hate this app I could've sworn I…
content: I hate this app I could've sworn I cancelled like a month ago but I still get charged it's to the point I might have to create a whole new cashapp with different credentials so I could stop paying for this useless app!

name: Giel Roozen
title: They are scammers
content: They are scammers. They charge too much money and they can't refund it. Customer service is ***.

name: Nicolas
title: Service client sympa même si un peu…
content: Service client sympa même si un peu long, de bonne données mais à vérifier quand même !

title: Scammers
content: Scammers, the service is terrible. First they offer to renew the trial and then they charge your card without notice.

title: Horrible customer service
content: Horrible customer service, horrible omg,small issue cannot be solved for 6 days already

title: I recommand
content: I recommand, it's good product

name: alexander
title: good for product research and affordable

name: edward
title: Refund policy
content: i think the website is okay im not going to nitpick, however, 2 day warning is not enough, most people who are starting drop shipping are busy, theres no refund policy for anything that gets in their hands, so basically if you forget to cancel, your money is theirs, for this reason i will not suggest this website to anyone i know, neither will i use it.

name: Abdul Hasyb
title: Total scam
content: Total scam. I cancelled the subscription but still they charge.
